name: Anidinian
remembrance: What special marriage traditions do you carry on?

name: Argosi
remembrance: How do you value charity while you have nothing to give?

name: Bwarhein
remembrance: Your people crave revenge. Do you? How do you fantasize about it?

name: Cumerian
remembrance: What is your way of defeating fear and seeking glory?

name: Gredoran
remembrance: Which metal in the factory is most holy? How do you worship it?

name: Heian
remembrance: Have you found a way to have honor?

name: Kilder
remembrance: Your people would have assigned you a role at birth. How does that make you feel in the factory?

name: Narscillian
remembrance: What do you sing to remember your ancestors?

name: Rathi
remembrance: Which of the King's three beasts do you identify with? Which one are you?

name: Scionic
remembrance: Locum will save us all. How do you pray for them?

name: Ulgatian
remembrance: What is the world's greatest evil? How do you fight it?

name: Yaman
remembrance: What oaths have you sworn? Have you ever broken one?
